description: Data transfer object (DTO) class for creating a new note, including validation annotations and Swagger schema annotations.

classes.name: NoteCreateRequest
classes.description: Schema class representing the payload for creating a new note, with validation and schema annotations.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note and returns the current object for chaining.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content/body of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note and returns the current object for chaining.
